name: OutWit Technologies
tag_list: collect, harvest, download, data, api, format, mashups, web-scraping, image-collection, data-collection, web-search, extraction, free-software, data-structure
overview:
OutWit Technologies is the publisher of software and Web services based on its original Web Collection technology, the OutWit platform.

OutWit’s general public tools aim at simplifying the Web users experience and enhancing the quality of their search results by offering numerous new recognition and organization features.

The platform is a software kernel and an API allowing advanced users to build collection tools for a large scope of applications, using semantic technologies to easily collect data and media from the Web, structure the collections and export them to the most common applications. It also includes a number of original navigation and automation features, recognizing navigation links, series of result pages and automatically browsing through Web sources.
